oai_dc:dc.dc:title: King Chapel at Union Ridge COGIC: field notes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: King Chapel at Union Ridge Church of God in Christ
Field notes of Kings Chapel Church at Union Ridge COGIC. The notes illustrate the location of King Chapel Church COGIC in relation to Union Ridge Road and the basic layout of the church.

The Kings Chapel Church building dates from the 1960s. Vinyl siding was added to the frame and additional work was completed in the 1980s. At the time of fieldwork (July 23, 1998), W. L. Rippy served as pastor and the church was thought to have once been the largest in the village.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American Churches -- Tennessee;
